thread.title: Michael
thread.title_full: Optical Express | Laser Eye Surgery reviewed by Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text:
Having decided to get involved with laser eye surgery and do away with my glasses. I started with an initial consultation with an optician. I was informed by him that because of my age 71 that lens replacement surgery would be the best course for me to follow. I agreed and I then had a subsequent consultation with my Surgeon Mr George. He carefully explained the procedure to me and I agreed to go ahead.
The operation was a complete success and I now have twenty twenty vision without glasses.
I have had several follow up visits to the optician to check that everything was healing up properly and that both my eyes were functioning correctly
My next appointment will be in November 12 months after my operation
From start to finish everyone was very professional.
I wish I had done this sooner.
